name: Cafe Ice Scream Story
description: Café Ice cream is about an evil, inhuman kind of Ice-cream parlor owner who sells ice cream and kidnaps people. Every mission requires a different skill set to complete it. Missions include rescuing your neighbors, free the staff from his magic spell, find map to unlock missions and burn the van. In the final level, you have to kill the scary ice-cream man. Enjoy this horror game with adventures scenarios.
